goals.active: Travel to Claw Island and warn the Lionguard.
goals.complete: I arrived on Claw Island just ahead of a Risen attack and found a new ally in the scholar Trahearne. We lit beacons at the fortress to warn Lion's Arch of Zhaitan's offshore forces, and we saw the Lionguard survivors of Fort Stalwart safely back to the mainland, though our retreat came at a terrible cost.
After the defeat at Claw Island, the survivors returned to Lion's Arch. It will take Zhaitan's minions some time to get reinforcements from Orr, but when they do...they will attack the city.
